game.name: SeedGod
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In SeedGod, your mission is to strategically plant in a field full of bugs. Choose the best positions, and you can discover unique plants, capture bugs, find tools, and access areas that will challenge your survival tactics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In SeedGod, your mission is to strategically plant in a field full of bugs. Choose the best positions, and you can discover unique plants, capture bugs, find tools, and access areas that will challenge your survival tactics.
